mapper.insert: insert into TB_LINK_INFO( NAME, URL, PARAMURL, IP, PORT, PROVINCEID, CITYID, MSBRAND, INTIME, SYSTEMID, LINK_INFO_ID ) values ( #{NAME}, #{URL}, #{PARAMURL}, #{IP}, #{PORT}, #{PROVINCEID}, #{CITYID}, #{MSBRAND}, #{INTIME}, #{SYSTEMID}, #{LINK_INFO_ID} )
mapper.update: update TB_LINK_INFO set NAME = #{NAME}, URL = #{URL}, PARAMURL = #{PARAMURL}, IP = #{IP}, PORT = #{PORT}, PROVINCEID = #{PROVINCEID}, CITYID = #{CITYID}, MSBRAND = #{MSBRAND}, INTIME = #{INTIME}, SYSTEMID = #{SYSTEMID}, LINK_INFO_ID = LINK_INFO_ID where LINK_INFO_ID = #{LINK_INFO_ID}
mapper.select: select NAME, URL, PARAMURL, IP, PORT, PROVINCEID, CITYID, MSBRAND, fn_companyValueByKey(MSBRAND) as MSBRANDNAME, INTIME, SYSTEMID, LINK_INFO_ID from TB_LINK_INFO where LINK_INFO_ID = #{LINK_INFO_ID}

select a.NAME, a.URL, a.PARAMURL, a.IP, a.PORT, a.PROVINCEID, p.VALUE as PROVINCENAME, a.CITYID, c.VALUE as CITYVALUE, a.MSBRAND, fn_companyValueByKey(a.MSBRAND) as MSBRANDNAME, a.INTIME, a.SYSTEMID, a.LINK_INFO_ID from TB_LINK_INFO a,TB_PROVINCE_INFO p,TB_CITY_INFO c where a.PROVINCEID = p.PROVINCEID and a.CITYID = c.CITYID ORDER BY INTIME
